Igwe Kenneth Onyeneke Orizu III (a mụrụ ya na afo otu puku na nari iteghete na iri na ise), O bụ nke iri abụọ  Obi nke Otolo na Igwe nke ọchịchị Nnewi
Ọ bụ onye isi ọdịnala na onye ndu ime mmụọ na Nnewi, obodo ndị Igbo na Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye so na usoro ọmụmụ Nnofo Royal na onye nọchiri nna ya Igwe  Josiah Orizu II, nna nna ya bụ Igwe Orizu I, na nna nna nna ya bụ Igwe Iwuchukwu Ezeifekaibeya
N’adịghị ka ọtụtụ alaeze ndị Igbo, e nwere ndị eze Nnewi tupu mbata ndị Ocha
Na steeti Anambra, Igwe Kenneth Orizu nke Atọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke Anambra Steeti nke Ndị Isi nke Anambra Steeti na afo puku abu na iri na ise  dika ọnye kachasị eze niile na Naijiria
Igwe Kenneth gụrụ akwụkwọ na Hope Waddell College, Calabar ma gụchaa akwụkwọ na New Betel Kolegi, Onitsha na afo otu puku na nari iteghete na  iri ano na abuo

Tupu e chie ya eze, Kenneth rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya otu ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ a na-akpọ Eastern Nigerian Outlook Group n'oge ahụ, na mpaghara Odida Anyawu nke Naịjirịa mebiri emebi ma mesịa kwaga Asaba dị ka onye njikwa azụmaahịa maka Mid-Western Region
Ọ bụkwa onye ọchụnta ego na Kano
Igwe Orizu nke abuo nyere aka ikpochapu ohia Agbo Edo
Nwanne nna ya, Prince Nwafor Orizu bụ onye Najiria mbụ buru Onyeisi Republic Sineti na nna nna ya, Igwe Orizu m (Ezek Ugbonyamba)bu onye Igbo nwoke  mbụ nke nwere ụgbọala na Odida Anyawu dum
Ofala Nnewi bụ emume omenaala nke a na- eme kwa afọ iji mee mmemme echichi nke Igwe nke Nnewi
Eze ahụ bụ onye mbụ n’ime ndị ọchịchị Naịjirịa kpochapụrụ usoro Osu, nke mere ka onye ọ bụla nọ na mpaghara Nnewi bụrụ onye amụrụ
Kenneth kwusiri  imefusị ihe onwunwe n'ememe alụmdi na nwunye ọdịnala na ememe olili ozu
Eze ahụ dozịrị ọgbaghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Nnewi site na ịhapụ obodo ahụ na ọgbakọ izugbe iji họpụta aha maka ya iji weghachite udo n'obodo ahụ
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, obodo kpọrọ ya Onyeisi Udo
Utu aha ya bụ, Ọchịagha nke Iwu nke Niger (CON)
Eze bụ onye otu Star Paul Harris Fellow nke Rotary International
Eze ahụ nyeere aka na nguzobe  Akwụkwọ Ọzụzụ Ndị nkuzi na Nnewi; ugbua Nnamdi Azikiwe University, Nnewi
Ọ kwadokwara ngwuzobe Mahadum Kolegi nke Health Sciences nke mahadum site n'ịgba ndị Nnewi ume ka ha nye nnukwu ego
Ya onwe ya nyere ọtụtụ ala maka ntọala ụlọ akwụkwọ ahu.
Eze haziri nhiwe e guzobere ahịa New Nnewi ma ahịa a nyekwara Nnewi ugwu dịka otu n’ime obodo azụmahịa kachasị na Naịjirịa
